thread.title: Colts' Mike Adams named AFC Defensive Player of the Week
thread.title_full: Colts' Mike Adams named AFC Defensive Player of the Week

title: Colts' Mike Adams named AFC Defensive Player of the Week
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Colts' Mike Adams named AFC Defensive Player of the Week Indianapolis Colts veteran safety Mike Adams was named AFC Defensive Player of the Week following his two-interception performance against Houston Post to Facebook Colts' Mike Adams named AFC Defensive Player of the Week Indianapolis Colts veteran safety Mike Adams was named AFC Defensive Player of the Week following his two-interception performance against Houston Check out this story on IndyStar.com: http://indy.st/1LtXfj3 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Colts' Mike Adams named AFC Defensive Player of the Week Indianapolis Star sports 11:39 a.m. EDT October 14, 2015 Colts strong safety Mike Adams (29) gets an interception with less than two minutes left, Oct. 8, 2015, at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas. (Photo: Matt_Kryger / The_Star) 5 CONNECT 13 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Indianapolis Colts veteran safety Mike Adams was named AFC Defensive Player of the Week following his two-interception performance against Houston during Week 5. 
The weekly award is the first such honor for the 12-year veteran, who made the Pro Bowl a year ago in his first season with the Colts. 
Adams finished last Thursday's game with five tackles and two passes defended in addition to his two picks. His first interception came on the Texans' first drive with Houston driving deep into Colts territory. His second came on Brian Hoyer's ill-advised heave down the field late in the game to preserve Indy's third win in a row. 
Adams is the first Colts player to win AFC Defensive Player of the Week since Jonathan Newsome in Week 17 last season. Adams has been one of Ryan Grigson's shrewdest moves -- signed him to veteran minimum last year, and he's had 10 takeaways in 24 games. â€” Zak Keefer (@zkeefer) October 14, 2015 Read or Share this story: http://indy.st/1LtXfj3 TOP VIDEOS
